mapper.insert: insert into neuedu_order ( user_id, order_no, shipping_id, payment, payment_type, postage, status, payment_time, send_time, end_time, close_time, create_time, update_time) values (#{order.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order.orderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{order.shippingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order.payment,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{order.paymentType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order.postage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order.paymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{order.sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{order.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{order.closeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, now(), now())
mapper.update:
update neuedu_order
user_id = #{order.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_no = #{order.orderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
shipping_id = #{order.shippingId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
payment = #{order.payment,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
payment_type = #{order.paymentType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
postage = #{order.postage,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{order.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = now(),
where id = #{order.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, order_no, shipping_id, payment, payment_type, postage, status, payment_time, send_time, end_time, close_time, create_time, update_time from neuedu_order where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, user_id, order_no, shipping_id, payment, payment_type, postage, status, payment_time, send_time, end_time, close_time, create_time, update_time from neuedu_order where user_id=#{userId}

select id, user_id, order_no, shipping_id, payment, payment_type, postage, status, payment_time, send_time, end_time, close_time, create_time, update_time from neuedu_order
and order_no like #{orderNO}
